topic.title: ZeroPlay
topic.body: Did something happen to ZeroPlay? It doesn't seem to appear as an option to open it at Home.

1573329847_1KENfNjTE2PPsRsUSNKr5fNNuFxSx.body:
> [kaar4bears](#comment_38_1MGP7Q7y11YBjwi2dUkB2Q93KusgxDCqsr): For me it works fine.http://127.0.0.1:43110/0play.bit

Strange. It just seems like it wasn't listed. Thanks for the link btw. I probably wouldn't have found it
